keyword: calories in one teaspoon of butter
title: Calories in One Teaspoon of Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in one teaspoon of butter, including fat, sodium, full nutrition breakdown per teaspoon, and simple tweaks for recipes.
h1: Calories in One Teaspoon of Butter
assumptions: Standard salted butter from a stick, softened or melted; ~4.7 g per teaspoon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, salted vs. unsalted, and exact measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of butter contains about 34 kcal, mostly from fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one teaspoon of butter?
Is butter high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.4 g saturated fat per teaspoon.

faqs.q: Does unsalted butter have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Calories are the same; it just has less sodium (about 2 mg vs. 31 mg).

faqs.q: How much fat is in a teaspoon of butter?
faqs.a: Total fat is 3.8 g, nearly all from dairy sources.

faqs.q: Can I use butter in baking without adding carbs?
faqs.a: Butter has 0 g carbs, making it suitable for low-carb recipes.
